# position

**Instance Property**

The position of the overlay on the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
var position: SKOverlay.Position { get set }
```

## Creating an App Clip Configuration

- **init(position:)**: Creates an object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend an App Clip’s corresponding app.
- **SKOverlay.Position**: Constants that identify the position of an overlay on the screen.
